tool.help:
QIIME 2: diversity pcoa-biplot ============================== Principal Coordinate Analysis Biplot
Outputs: -------- :biplot.qza: The resulting PCoA matrix.
|
Description: ------------ Project features into a principal coordinates matrix. The features used should be the features used to compute the distance matrix. It is recommended that these variables be normalized in cases of dimensionally heterogeneous physical variables.
|
